name: Pigeonly, Inc
description: Developer of an online platform intended to identify inmates across any federal, state or county penal system. The company's platform assists friends and family members to feasibly send photos to inmates through their smartphones, computers and tablets, enabling individuals to keep in touch with their inmates.
